title: Largest known compositorial prime
summary:
I ran across a blog post here that said a new record has been set for the largest compositorial prime. [1] OK, so what is a compositorial prime? It is a prime number of the form n! / n# + 1 where n# denotes n primorial, the product of the prime numbers no greater than n. The […]

The post Largest known compositorial prime first appeared on John D. Cook.
